p:
The scores of the thirteen vegetable oils ranged from 2 to 6. The highest scores were obtained from low erucic acid rapeseed oil, flaxseed oil, and peony seed oil, while the lowest score was evident in palm oil. The results indicated that peony seed oil, flaxseed oil, and low erucic acid rapeseed oil have the highest scores, which were similar to those of Li.
42 The score of edible blend oil is also 6 points, but edible blend oil is a kind of artificial edible vegetable oil. It is an edible oil made from two or more refined oils (except aromatic oil) in proportion according to the needs of use, hence the score is also high.
